title: Lesson 8.3: Class vs Instance Methods
description: Practice creating and using both class methods and instance methods in Ruby classes
starterCode:
# Create classes with both class and instance methods
# Use class methods for factory patterns and utilities
# Use instance methods for object-specific operations

class Calculator
  # Your class and instance methods here
end

class BankAccount
  # Your class and instance methods here
end

class Library
  # Your class and instance methods here
end
hints: Class methods are defined with self.method_name or class << self
Instance methods are defined normally and work on object instances
Class methods can access class variables but not instance variables
Instance methods can access both instance and class variables
Use class methods for factory patterns and utility functions
Use instance methods for operations on specific objects
